mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.audit_id AS "auditId", a.audit_man AS "auditMan", a.audit_job AS "auditJob"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM oa_audit_man a
and a.audit_man LIKE CONCAT('%',#{auditMan},'%')
and a.audit_job like CONCAT('%',#{auditJob},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_audit_man( id, audit_id, audit_man, audit_job ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{auditId}, #{auditMan}, #{auditJob} )
